comment.author: 14529688@N08
comment._content: The sign in the photo says Alexandria, so I believe the catalog data is wrong. Presumably the error came from the erroneous original caption? I'd like to tag this with the correct info, but tagging is disabled.

comment.author: 35740357@N03
comment._content:
Thanks for this comment, Ken!

Very good eye for spotting "Alexandria" on that sign in the Potomac River. Arlington and Alexandria are so close together on the Potomac it would be hard to determine exactly where the photo was taken and the location of the sign. Perhaps others can weigh in with thoughts and opinions.

Also, we corrected the tagging restrictions on this photo set and you should now be able to add tags.

Jerry (U.S. National Archives)
